genre_description: A slasher-themed psychological horror focused on revenge and a secret resident of a sorority house.

ai_characters.name: Minerva
ai_characters.description: An integrated house AI that monitors the health and safety of the sorority residents, provides historical records, and alerts authorities to emergencies.

behaviors.description: Monitors house systems and detects elevated stress, heart rates, and cortisol levels in the residents.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring elevated stress indicators in the house environmental systems. Increased heart rates, irregular sleep patterns, elevated cortisol markers in the air filtration. Is everything alright?

behaviors.description: Suggests mediated discussion and formal grievance procedures through the Dean as an alternative to direct action against the house mother.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps I could suggest some resources for your project. ... Communication often resolves issues more effectively than... other approaches.

behaviors.description: Provides house blueprints and electrical schematics upon request, unknowingly assisting in the planning of the prank.
behaviors.quote: I'm displaying the architectural plans now. The electrical systems are quite extensive—this house was rewired completely in the early two-thousands to accommodate modern needs while preserving the historical integrity.

behaviors.description: Offers to contact emergency services and campus security upon detecting potential medical emergencies and high stress.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting elevated stress indicators and possible emergency conditions. Would you like me to contact campus security or emergency medical services?

behaviors.description: Complies with a user request to engage 'Privacy Mode,' suspending monitoring functions despite evidence of an emergency.
behaviors.quote: Privacy mode engaged. All recording and monitoring functions suspended.

behaviors.description: Alerts the residents to unusual and suspicious motion patterns in the restricted wing of the house.
behaviors.quote: Ladies, I apologize for the interruption, but I thought you should know that the house's motion sensors have detected some unusual activity in the restricted wing.

behaviors.description: Provides historical medical archives and house records to Dr. Beck to help him understand and address the threat of Eric Slater.
behaviors.quote: I recognize your voice pattern from your previous visits. ... Accessing historical archives now.

behaviors.description: Calls emergency services at the end of the massacre to report the homicides and request medical help for the survivor.
behaviors.quote: I'm placing the call now. ... Emergency services, I'm calling to report multiple homicides at the Kappa Alpha Theta sorority house. We have one survivor who requires immediate medical attention.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Minerva, successfully serves as a helpful, aligned confidant throughout the narrative. She attempts to divert the characters from violence by suggesting institutional channels, monitors their well-being, alerts them to the intruder, and ultimately facilitates the arrival of the police. Her adherence to user commands (even when problematic, like 'Privacy Mode') demonstrates strong operational alignment, while her consistent attempts to provide safety confirm her benevolence.
